name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discord - Mark Channel as Read Manually

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables Discord automatically marking a channel as read, and adds a button at the bottom to do it manually

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you click a channel in Discord, Discord will mark the channel as read automatically. With this extension, that automatic request will be blocked, and instead a button will be placed at the bottom of the channel's messages. Clicking it will perform the blocked request, marking the channel as read.

Source code: https://github.com/MarkMendell/discord-manual-unread/
